Class UShortVar

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.data.AbstractData

All Implemented Interfaces:
Data, Var<java.lang.Integer>
public class UShortVar
extends AbstractVar<java.lang.Integer>

A Var with an unsigned short value.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

getValue

public java.lang.Integer getValue()

copy

public Data copy()
Creates a clone of this data. The resulting data will be of the same type, have the same location, the same store, and have other similar attributes to this type.

Returns:
A clone of this data.
